thread.title: Little Mix's prom night doesn't go to plan in new 'Love Me Like You' video - Music
thread.title_full: Little Mix's prom night doesn't go to plan in new 'Love Me Like You' video - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Little Mix's prom night doesn't go to plan in new 'Love Me Like You' video - Music
text: Little Mix have a prom night disaster in their music video for 'Love Me Like You'.Continuing the high school theme from the 'Black Magic' music video, the girls don't seem to have the best luck in the track's official promo.They get all dressed up for the dance, only to discover their date asked each of them out and then arrived with another girl.'Love Me Like You' is the second track to be lifted from their forthcoming album Get Weird, which will be released on November 6. Â© Rachael Wright It's the band's third studio album and acts as a follow up to 2013's Salute.Little Mix will support the release of their third studio album with a headline arena tour in the UK next year.Little Mix think X Factor having a rest is a good idea: "It's getting a bit predictable"Watch the girls chat to Digital Spy in our 60-second interview below: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4519788252001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14519788252001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4519788252001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4519788252001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14519788252001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4519788252001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
